revision.text: Possibly: A new and full, critical, biographical, and geographical history of Scotland containing the history of the succession of their kings from Robert Bruce, to the present time. With an impartial account of their constitution, genius, impartial account of their constitution, genius, manners, and customs. With a geographical description of the several counties... together with an appendix... and a map of each county in Scotland. (By William Duff). (London, Printed for the author, 1749). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/1008483337
